title: Handwoven Skirt, Sucre, Bolivia
marks:
Inscription

on back, in red ink: [BOLIVIA / MAR
description: view from the waist down of a figure wearing a skirt with woven bands of geometric designs, horses and birds, from back; mounted on board
creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
